author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds a configuration option to `RNTupleTempSource` and `EmbeddedRNTupleTempSource` to disable the use of ROOT's implicit multithreading (IMT) in RNTuple reader. It probably won't be useful in production setting, but can be useful in studies of RNTuple behavior.

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/framework-team/issues/1817 

#### PR validation:

Appears to work in a private test.
title: Add an option to disable IMT on RNTuple reading
